popups-message: Name shown in user preference for this extension
popups-last-edited:
Message to show time span since the page was last edited. Parameters:
* $1 - the timespan in words (localized). e.g. "3 months ago"
popups-redirects:
Unused at this time.

Message shown when the hovercard is showing a redirected page.

Parameters:
* $1 - ...
